dt-option.name: language.stateRestore

type.description: This option is capable of holding all of the sub-options for languages for `-init stateRestore`.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.stateRestore` object is `-type undefined`. Meaning that as standard there are no extra options to add to the panes for language.
dt-option.description:
As standard, no custom options will be applied to the StateRestore language options if `-init language.stateRestore` is undefined. Otherwise the related options will be applied if they are defined within this object.
This is useful as it means that the language options can be set for StateRestore leading to increased internationalisation.
